a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: PISA: Mean performance on the mathematics scale, by sex, 2015
Average score of 15-year-old students on the PISA mathematics scale. The metric for the overall reading scale is
based on a mean for participating OECD countries set at 500, with a standard deviation of 100.
PISA: Mean performance on the mathematics scale. Male
PISA: Mean performance on the mathematics scale. Female
Source: OECD Programme for International Student Assessment (PISA)
